definitions.definition: Any thing or person that retains .
A dependent or follower of someone of rank.
A paid servant, especially one who has been employed for many years.
A fee one pays to reserve the other's time for services .
examples: This lawyer charges a retainer for his work.

definitions.definition: A device that holds teeth in position after orthodontic treatment.

main_definition: Any thing or person that retains .
secondary_definitions: A dependent or follower of someone of rank.
A paid servant, especially one who has been employed for many years.
A fee one pays to reserve the other's time for services .
( dentistry ) A device that holds teeth in position after orthodontic treatment.
( rail transport , mechanical engineering ) A retaining valve .
